ValidationRule.description: Adobe Creative Cloud Plugin minimum price for a license is 20 USD/EUR
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(CONTAINS($User.LastName, "Bypass")), NOT(Quantity<0), NOT(CONTAINS($Profile.Name,"System Administrator")), NOT(CONTAINS($Profile.Name, "Finance")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Type,"Existing Business-Renewal")), CONTAINS(Product2.Name,"Adobe CC Users"), NOT(CreatedDate>Now()-0.0007), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Standard_Package_Name__c,"Enterprise" )), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Standard_Package_Name__c,"Corporate" )), (CURRENCYRATE(Opportunity.Currency_Text__c)*(TotalPrice/Quantity))<20, (CURRENCYRATE(Opportunity.Currency_Text__c)*(TotalPrice/Quantity))>0)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The minimum price for an Adobe Creative Cloud Plugin is 20 USD/EUR per licence.
